turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there. I was looking for I was looking to order three small pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Chicken bacon ranch, barbecue chicken, and.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: meat lovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All of them with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that bella charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 small pizzas with extra cheese, 1 chicken bacon ranch, 1 bbq chicken, and 1 meatlovers, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $45, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick-up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Will dine out.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll make sure there will be a table available for you, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it for me. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
